item.title: Bethany add a quote by Francois Fenelon
item.description: "The history of the world suggests that without love of God there is little likelihood of a love for man that does not become corrupt." -- Francois Fenelon

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Joshua Harris
item.description: "When God knows you're ready for the responsibility of commitment, He'll reveal the right person under the right circumstances." -- Joshua Harris

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Joshua Harris
item.description: "Don’t concern yourself with being right in others’ eyes. And don’t secretly hope that their lives will fall apart so that your opinion will be vindicated. Instead, concentrate on obeying God in your own life and, when possible, helping others to obey Him as well. You don’t have to prove others wrong to continue on the course you know God has shown you." -- Joshua Harris

item.title: Bethany add a quote by David Platt
item.description: "But then I realize there is never going to be a day when I stand before God and He looks at me and says, 'I wish you would have kept more for yourself.' I'm confident that God will take care of me." -- David Platt

item.title: Bethany add a quote by David Platt
item.description: "The modern-day gospel says, 'God loves you and has a wonderful plan for your life. Therefore, follow these steps, and you can be saved.' Meanwhile, the biblical gospel says, 'You are an enemy of God, dead in your sin, & in your present state of rebellion, you are not even able to see that you need life, much less to cause yourself to come to life. Therefore, you are radically dependent on God to do something in your life that you could never do." -- David Platt

item.title: Bethany add a quote by David Platt
item.description: "God beckons storm clouds and they come. He tells the wind to blow and the rain to fall, and they obey immediately. He speaks to the mountains, 'You go there,' and He says to the seas, 'You stop here, and they do it. Everything in all creation responds in obedience to the Creator...until we get to you and me. We have the audacity to look God in the face and say, 'No." -- David Platt

item.title: Bethany add a quote by David Platt
item.description: "Every saved person this side of heaven owes the gospel to every lost person this side of hell." -- David Platt

item.title: Bethany add a quote by David Platt
item.description: "A materialistic world will not be won to Christ by a materialistic church." -- David Platt
